info.title: Carrier Service Service API

post.description: Create the appointment specified within the body of this request. The created appointment will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: newAppointmentV1
parameters.description: A new appointment to be created

get.description: Retrieves the appointment specified by the id provided.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the appointment to get

put.description: Update the Appointment specified by the id provided in the URL. The updated appointment will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the appointment to replace

parameters.name: newAppointmentV1
parameters.description: A appointment to replace the existing appointment

delete.description: Delete the appointment specified by the id provided in the URL.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the appointment to delete

patch.description: Patch the Appointment specified by the id provided in the URL. The updated appointment will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the appointment to update

parameters.name: patch
parameters.description: A JSON Patch to update an existing appointment

get.description: Find all Appointments that match the given list of Carrier Ids.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

parameters.name: carrierIds
parameters.description: List of Carrier Ids.

get.description: Search by Carrier NAIC or Carrier name.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Search term to search on Carrier NAIC or Carrier name.

carrierLocations.description: list of carrier locations associated with appointment

downloadsSetup.description: true if downloads are enabled, false if manual data entry is required

serviceAgreement.description: true if a carrier service agreement is in place

id.description: Unique id of the billing option

cashAccountingOverride.description: true if override is enabled, false if override is not enabled, with false as the default value

groupId.description: Id of the billing options group this billing option belongs to

lineOfBusiness.description: The list of lines of business that the billing options apply to

id.description: Unique id of the business contact

primaryContact.description: Flag to mark the primary contact.

id.description: Unique id of the carrier location address
Unique id of the carrier location email

primaryEmail.description: Flag to mark the primary email.

id.description: Unique id of the carrier location phone number

primaryPhoneNumber.description: Flag to mark the primary phone number.

receivesFax.description: does this phone number receive fax

id.description: Unique id of the carrier location

carrierLocationAddress.description: The address associated with a carrier location

carrierLocationEmails.description: list of carrier location emails associated with carrier location

carrierLocationPhoneNumbers.description: list of carrier location phone numbers associated with carrier location

primaryLocation.description: Flag to mark the primary location.

tenantId.description: ID of the Tenant in which the resource is stored

entityId.description: ID of the Entity in which the resource is stored

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

spanId.description: The unique ID of the span.

relatedObjects.description: A map of different kinds of objects related to the response. Each key in the map is a type of object that is referenced from the content of the response, e.g. a User or an Entity. Each value of the map is itself a map, but of the objects' IDs to the objects themselves so as to allow looking each object up via the ID that was provided in the content.
